message.content: Initial lists with one element each.
The two blue elements belong to different lists and, hence, the union has to be executed.
The union of the two lists to which the blue elements belong starts.
The green list is not longer than the yellow one and, hence, must be appended to it.
The rightmost yellow element in the shorter list has been moved to the longer list.
The shorter yellow list has to be appended to the longer yellow one.
The shorter list has been appended to the longer one.
The list union ended.
